00441   /*
00442      @author Rahul Sampath
00443      @brief Splits a communication group into two, processors with 
00444      ranks less than splittingRank form one group and the other 
00445      processors form the second group. Both the groups are sorted in 
00446      the ascending order of their ranks in the old comm.
00447      @param splittingRank The rank used for splitting the communicator
00448      @param orig_comm    The comm group that needs to be split.
00449      @param new_comm     The new comm group.
00450      */
00451   int splitCommUsingSplittingRank(int splittingRank, MPI_Comm* new_comm, MPI_Comm orig_comm);
